entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog at times this evening. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 early in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
